name: 0PS4Masked
description: Pixel sorting effect applied only within the segmentation mask, with options for sorting thresholds and pixel sorting directions.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Minimum pixel brightness for sorting. Pixels below this brightness are ignored in the sorting process.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Maximum pixel brightness for sorting. Pixels above this brightness are ignored in the sorting process.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Direction of pixel sorting: 0 for vertical sorting, 1 for horizontal sorting.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Sorts pixels by 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.
